0x16.label: TravelSpeed
0x16.note: the speed that the projectile travels at

0x17.label: BulletHitAnimation
0x17.note: The animation to play when projectile hits something (index? but doesn't appear in DEMO.DAS or ADEMO.DAS)

0x30.label: FlashScreen
0x30.note: Flashes the environment. First darkness then brightness. Value is the intensity

0x33.label: WeaponIconUI
0x33.note: Which icon to display on screen for an equipped weapon (0x0A is unused Mace)

0x20.label: WeaponAmmoRecharge
0x20.note:
the inventory index of the ammo refill.
when second byte is 80, it's a rechargeable weapon and the first byte represents ammo recharge rate

0x12.label: WeaponAnimation
0x12.note: The passive and attacking weapon animation. Offset to the animation

0x18.label: WeaponBulletDelay
0x18.note: For weapon, the delay after firing to spawn the bullet object

0xa2.label: Weapon X screen offset
0xa2.note: offsets the weapon's onscreen horizontal position (affects where projectile is fired)

0x2c.label: WeaponAnimationSpeed
0x2c.note: for a weapon, modifies the animation play speed (directly impacts fire rate)

0x00.label: InventoryDocumentImage
0x00.note: for notes/maps/etc, the image to show after initial animation

0xa8.label: SetMonsterSecondaryBullet
0xa8.note: sets the bullet for a monster's secondary attack

0x28.label: SetMonsterBullet
0x28.note: sets the bullet for a monster's primary attack

0xa7.label: BulletVulnerable
0xa7.note: For a monster, set vulnerability against a bullet (bullet does 2x damage). this can stack

0x27.label: BulletResistance
0x27.note: For a monster, sets the resistance against a bullet by index (bullet does no damage)

0xa9.label: OnMonsterDamageSFX
0xa9.note: For a monster, what sound effect to play on damage (when run multiple times, randomly chooses one) (bugged? when multiple are selected, will not play the last one? need to add it twice)

0x29.label: MonsterRoamingSFX
0x29.note: sets the sound effect to play during enemy roam (multiple can be set with multiple calls)

0xb1.label: MonsterCritDeathSFX
0xb1.note: The sound effect to play when monster critically dies (like from max health in a single hit)

0x31.label: MonsterDeathSFX
0x31.note: the sound effect to play when the monster dies (but not critically dies, see 0xB1)

0x2a.label: MonsterPrimAttackSFX
0x2a.note: sets the sound effect to play when monster makes its primary attack

0x2b.label: MonsterPrimAttackDelay
0x2b.note: the delay to spawn the bullet for an monster's primary attack

0xaa.label: MonsterSecondAttackSFX
0xaa.note: the sound effect to play when monster makes its secondary attack

0xab.label: MonsterSecondAttackDelay
0xab.note: the delay to spawn the bullet for a monster's secondary attack

0x32.label: MonsterSpawnSFX
0x32.note: the sound effect to play when the monster spawns

0x26.label: SetHealthOrHeal
0x26.note: Initializes max health of a monster or heals by value

0x0d.label: If flag set, then next command

0x8d.label: If not flag set, next command
